ComicInfo.Title: The Way We Were
ComicInfo.Summary: The Way We Were: The Mauve Visitor and Tempting Tigress each tell their versions of what happened the day the Planetary Brigands tried to steal the Empyrean Chalice. The Grim Knight comes in and offers his version of the story.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 06:42:35. [Issue ID 345216]
ComicInfo.Characters: Happy Hunter,Lord Toxic,Earth Goddess],Spunky,Tempting Tigress,Big Mermaid, The Third Eye,Planetary Brigade [Mister Valor,Purring Pussycat (formerly the Tempting Tigress),The Mauve Visitor,Planetary Brigands [Mister Master,Excreta,Genetiwitch],Gnarly,The Celestial Speed-Skater,Grim Knight
